primaryPhoto.description:
Steven Moffat‘s (Doctor Who, Sherlock, Dracula) hit comedy THE UNFRIEND is coming to the West End direct from Chichester for a limited run at the Criterion Theatre in 2023.
THE UNFRIEND takes a hugely entertaining and satirical look at middle-class England’s disastrous instinct always to appear nice. Manners can be murder.
The production is directed by Mark Gatiss (A Christmas Carol), with the show reuniting a cast of Reece Shearsmith (Inside No 9, A Very Expensive Poison), Amanda Abbington (Sherlock, The Son) and Frances Barber (Silk).
Book your THE UNFRIEND theatre tickets with LOVEtheatre today!
